alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 12:30AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations mostly between 3 and 5 inches, with localized higher accumulations above mountain pass level. Winds gusting mostly to 30 mph, but as high as 50 mph at ridgetops. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could lead to blowing and drifting snow, which may significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
